title: League crashes on game start
body:
This is starting to get seriously annoying, whenever i find a match and get through the champ select screen my game crashes and will not let me reconnect because of subsequent crashing, I'm not sure if its just me or if anybody else has experienced this issue but i have had a few 20 min bans already and would like to be able to play properly again. The game will load up and work fine after maybe 2/5 attempts. Any help will be greatly appreciated, Thanks

btw I have reinstalled the client and tried to repair it twice now

replies.body: If the crash you're getting is a bugsplat, then your might have bad game files or drivers failing to render the game.  You should go over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get that fixed up.  Make sure to test it in a custom game to be sure so you don't get anymore [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
